HomePage.intro: Hey, I’m Matthieu — a French full-stack engineer who loves clean code and clever interfaces.
HomePage.name: Name
HomePage.logEntry01-A: LOG 01-A: Frontend and backend synced. No loose wires.
HomePage.logEntry01-B: LOG 01-B: Built with care, not shortcuts. Debugged edge cases before they happened.
HomePage.logEntry01-C: LOG 02-C: Deployed. Fast, scalable, readable. Just how it should be.

Metadata.title: Matthieu Daulhiac | Full Stack Engineer
Metadata.description: I am Matthieu Daulhiac, a Full Stack Engineer with expertise in React, Node.js, and cloud technologies. Explore my projects and skills.
Metadata.keywords: Matthieu Daulhiac;Full Stack Engineer;Freelance Web Developer;React;NextJS;NodeJS;Portfolio

AboutPageMetadata.title: About Me | Matthieu Daulhiac
AboutPageMetadata.description: Learn more about Matthieu Daulhiac, a Full Stack Engineer with a passion for web development and cloud technologies.
AboutPageMetadata.keywords: Matthieu Daulhiac;Full Stack Engineer;Freelance Web Developer;React;NextJS;NodeJS;Portfolio

b2bCommerce.title: B2B Platform for On
b2bCommerce.description: I built and maintained On’s internal B2B commerce platform, designing scalable NestJS APIs and a modern admin panel for managing product data and users.; I led key refactoring efforts, improved test coverage, and enhanced CI/CD pipelines.; I also delivered regional optimizations and seasonal data ingestion flows to support global product launches.

wrappedPunks.title: Wrapped Punks
wrappedPunks.description: I refactored the front-end of Wrapped Punks, a project focused on creating a more efficient and user-friendly interface for managing wrapped CryptoPunks NFTs.; I improved the codebase by implementing best practices in React and TypeScript, enhancing performance and maintainability.

ozu.title: Ozu
ozu.description: I built a webcomic platform using NextJS, integrating NFT minting, Metamask-based wallet authentication, and creator tools.;I led blockchain development, designing and testing smart contracts with Solidity and Hardhat.;I also contributed across the full stack to deliver an intuitive experience for readers, creators, and internal users.

ProjectsPageMetadata.title: Projects | Matthieu Daulhiac
ProjectsPageMetadata.description: Discover a selection of my development projects, showcasing expertise in full-stack engineering, blockchain, and modern web technologies.
ProjectsPageMetadata.keywords: Matthieu Daulhiac, Full Stack Engineer, Blockchain Developer, React, NextJS, NodeJS, NestJS, Portfolio

b2bCommerce.keywords: B2B, On, Commerce Platform, NestJS, TypeScript, CI/CD, React, China, Internal Tooling
